generic_name: 10 Vitamin & 6 Mineral [Pregnancy and Breast Feeding Formula]
details: ActiMom is indicated for treatment of vitamin & mineral deficiency in pregnant and lactating mothers. It fulfills the increased demand of nutrients during pregnancy and lactation and thus ensures a healthy baby.
user_tips: Take ActiMom during pregnancy and breastfeeding to help meet increased nutrient needs.
precautions: Use only if you are pregnant or breastfeeding, as directed for vitamin and mineral needs.

details: Lyby is a pediculicide indicated for the topical treatment of head lice infestation in patients 6 months of age and older. Lyby should be used in the context of an overall lice management program: Wash (with hot water) or dry-clean all recently worn clothing, hats, used bedding and towels Wash personal care items such as combs, brushes and hair clips in hot water Use a fine-tooth comb or special nit comb to remove dead lice and nits.
user_tips: Wash clothing, bedding, and personal items in hot water after using Lyby to prevent re-infestation.
precautions: Wash clothing, bedding, and personal items in hot water as part of lice treatment.

details: Acaril is indicated as an adjunct to diet and exercise to improve glycemic control in adults with type 2 diabetes mellitus.
user_tips: Use Acaril with diet and exercise to manage type 2 diabetes.
precautions: Use Acaril with diet and exercise as directed for diabetes.

details: Gluco-A is indicated as an adjunct to diet and exercise to improve glycemic control in adults with type 2 diabetes mellitus.

precautions: Use Gluco-A with diet and exercise for blood sugar control.

details: Sugatrol is indicated as an adjunct to diet and exercise to improve glycemic control in adults with type 2 diabetes mellitus.

precautions: Use Sugatrol with diet and exercise as directed for type 2 diabetes.

details: Tendonil is indicated in Pain & inflammation associated with musculoskeletal & joint disorders. Such as: Rheumatoid arthritis, Osteoarthritis, Low back pain. Pain after an operation.
user_tips: Tendonil can help manage pain and inflammation from joint or muscle problems; use as directed by your doctor.
precautions: Use with caution in musculoskeletal and joint disorders; seek medical advice.

details: This solution is used for haemodialysis.

precautions: This solution is specifically for hemodialysis; use only as directed by a healthcare professional.

details: Aceten is indicated as an adjuvant treatment in certain clinical condition characterized by the presence of thick and viscous mucoid or mucopurulent secretions such as: Chronic bronchopulmonary diseases (chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, emphysema with bronchitis, chronic asthmatic bronchitis ... Read moreAceten is indicated as an adjuvant treatment in certain clinical condition characterized by the presence of thick and viscous mucoid or mucopurulent secretions such as: Chronic bronchopulmonary diseases (chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, emphysema with bronchitis, chronic asthmatic bronchitis, bronchiectasis); Acute bronchopulmonary diseases (asthma with bronchial mucus plugging, bronchitis, bronchopneumonia, tracheobronchitis, bronchiolitis, pulmonary complications of cystic fibrosis, pulmonary complications associated with surgery).
user_tips: Use Aceten granules to help clear thick mucus in respiratory conditions like bronchitis or COPD.
precautions: Use as an adjuvant treatment for conditions with thick mucus as directed by your doctor.

details: Soricap is indicated in severe extensive psoriasis which is resistant to other forms of therapy, palmo-plantar pustular psoriasis, severe congenital ichthyosis, severe Darier’s disease (keratosis follicularis).
user_tips: Soricap is for severe skin conditions unresponsive to other treatments; use as directed by your doctor.
precautions: Soricap is for severe skin conditions unresponsive to other treatments.

details: Diarrhoea & poisoning due to foods, heavy meals & drugs. Flatulence due to diet & other factors.

details: Acerux intravenous infusion is indicated for the treatment of- Acute clinical manifestations of Herpes simplex virus in immunocompromised patients Severe primary or non-primary genital herpes in immune competent patients Varicella zoster virus infection in immunocompromised patients Herpes zoster (shingles) in immune competent patients who show very severe acute local or systemic manifestations of the disease Herpes simplex encephalitis
user_tips: Acerux IV treats severe viral infections in immunocompromised individuals, consult your doctor for use.
precautions: Use only for specific viral infections in immunocompromised or severe cases.

details: Acerux intravenous infusion is indicated for the treatment of- Acute clinical manifestations of Herpes simplex virus in immunocompromised patients Severe primary or non-primary genital herpes in immune competent patients Varicella zoster virus infection in immunocompromised patients Herpes zoster (shingles) in immune competent patients who show very severe acute local or systemic manifestations of the disease Herpes simplex encephalitis
user_tips: Acerux IV is used for severe viral infections; follow your doctor's instructions carefully.
precautions: Use only for the indicated severe viral infections; consult a doctor.

details: Acyvir intravenous infusion is indicated for the treatment of- Acute clinical manifestations of Herpes simplex virus in immunocompromised patients Severe primary or non-primary genital herpes in immune competent patients Varicella zoster virus infection in immunocompromised patients Herpes zoster (shingles) in immune competent patients who show very severe acute local or systemic manifestations of the disease Herpes simplex encephalitis
user_tips: Acyvir IV is for severe viral infections, especially in those with weak immunity. Seek medical care immediately if you suspect these.
precautions: Administer Acyvir IV infusion only under medical supervision due to its use in severe infections.

details: Clovir intravenous infusion is indicated for the treatment of- Acute clinical manifestations of Herpes simplex virus in immunocompromised patients Severe primary or non-primary genital herpes in immune competent patients Varicella zoster virus infection in immunocompromised patients Herpes zoster (shingles) in immune competent patients who show very severe acute local or systemic manifestations of the disease Herpes simplex encephalitis
user_tips: This IV infusion treats severe viral infections in immunocompromised and some immunocompetent patients, consult your doctor.
precautions: Use cautiously in immunocompromised patients or those with severe infections.

details: Simplovir intravenous infusion is indicated for the treatment of- Acute clinical manifestations of Herpes simplex virus in immunocompromised patients Severe primary or non-primary genital herpes in immune competent patients Varicella zoster virus infection in immunocompromised patients Herpes zoster (shingles) in immune competent patients who show very severe acute local or systemic manifestations of the disease Herpes simplex encephalitis
user_tips: Simplovir IV treats severe herpes and shingles; use as directed by a healthcare professional.
precautions: Use only under medical supervision, as it's for severe infections in specific patients.

details: Simplovir intravenous infusion is indicated for the treatment of- Acute clinical manifestations of Herpes simplex virus in immunocompromised patients Severe primary or non-primary genital herpes in immune competent patients Varicella zoster virus infection in immunocompromised patients Herpes zoster (shingles) in immune competent patients who show very severe acute local or systemic manifestations of the disease Herpes simplex encephalitis
user_tips: Simplovir IV is for serious infections; use as directed by your doctor.
precautions: Use Simplovir IV for severe infections in immunocompromised patients and specific herpes types.

details: Simplovir intravenous infusion is indicated for the treatment of- Acute clinical manifestations of Herpes simplex virus in immunocompromised patients Severe primary or non-primary genital herpes in immune competent patients Varicella zoster virus infection in immunocompromised patients Herpes zoster (shingles) in immune competent patients who show very severe acute local or systemic manifestations of the disease Herpes simplex encephalitis
user_tips: Seek immediate medical attention if you experience severe herpes or shingles symptoms for IV infusion.
precautions: Use with caution in immunocompromised patients and those with severe infections.

details: Virux intravenous infusion is indicated for the treatment of- Acute clinical manifestations of Herpes simplex virus in immunocompromised patients Severe primary or non-primary genital herpes in immune competent patients Varicella zoster virus infection in immunocompromised patients Herpes zoster (shingles) in immune competent patients who show very severe acute local or systemic manifestations of the disease Herpes simplex encephalitis
user_tips: Virux IV is for serious infections like shingles and herpes; use only as prescribed by your doctor.
precautions: Virux IV is for serious infections; monitor for severe side effects and follow doctor's instructions closely.
